location: Jilin Road, near Songjiang-Nanjing MRT Station (435m), close to Changan Elementary School
notes: Spacious 3BR/2BA full-floor apartment (50 ping) on 11F of 14-story elevator building in Zhongshan. Well-furnished with full appliances, natural gas cooking allowed, and pets negotiable. Good for families with excellent nearby schools and MRT access. Unable to assess baby safety features (balcony railings, corners) or actual condition from description alone - recommend viewing. Monthly cost is 80k rent + 6k management fee.
